reviewText: This DVD could save you tons of frustration. If you're technologically challenged or even remotely confused, consider this helpful tool. It's much more affordable than hiring a professional. Plus, you'll have one at your disposal anytime without a crazy hourly fee. Very comprehensive.

This DVD was full of usefull information for purchasing and setting up a theater system in your home.  I'm so glad I watched this DVD before spending hundreds or thousands of dollars on a system that may be way more than I need or want.  With all the viewing options out there I have more confidence of where to go and what to ask to find the right fit.
